item.title: HOOD
item.description: score:88 Chances: Shares of Robinhood (HOOD) jumped 7.3% in the afternoon session after major indices rose The company announced plans for a dual listing to increase liquidity of its shares and reach investors in more markets The continued focus on providing retail brokerage, trading in U.
